metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21443 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Agents are able to list customer user emails without required permissionsin the bulk action screen. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) CommunityEdition: 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS: 7.0.xversions prior to 7.0.27.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
